MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry affecting a number of properties in the local area. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:15 pm in order to carry out repair work in safety on the overhead line network , and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:17pm on the 29th January 2021.
